source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger warns we should, he should, vermeiden (avoid, flee) the word “spirit”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger would have to close up thinking-shop if called by the faith

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: avoidance, denegation, categories of psychoanalysis, inadequate when it comes to questions of Being

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: a modality of “avoiding” like using quotation marks or a non-negative crossed-shape crossing out (kreuzweise Durchstreichung); p. 52 the crossing out here symbolizes the fourfold

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: theme of spirit has been disinherited (forclos d’heritage) from Heidegger’s oeuvre

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: from spirit—to fire; history of title De l’esprit ——Rousseau was penning a condemnation of Helvétius’ De l’esprit when he discovered the author was being prosecuted, he threw his text into the fire

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: “tell me what you think about translation and I will tell you who you are”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: pneuma, spiritus, Geist (quarrel btwn languages, Übersetzung)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: more sensitive to Germanness of esprit, Geist, if we hear it coming from a foreign language, if we put to the test its resistance to translation, submitting our own language to the same test

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: what remains unquestioned for Heidegger, Geist is force itself in the most out-of-the-ordinary manifestation, acquires extraordinary authority in German, and, not appearing at forefront of scene, it w/draws from any destruction or deconstruction, as if it did not “belong to the history of ontology” [Derrida on his modest itinerary toward exposure]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: geistig and geistlich are modalities of Geist that bring privilege to the political

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida follows 4 threads in Of Spirit: 1) question of question 2) technological contamination 3) animality/humanism 4) epochality as narrative thread

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: why not stand firm and interrogate prescription and proscription? [re: phrase axiomatics of Destruktion, which Heidegger would have refused], axiomatics only suspect in epochal schema

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s spirituality would be a nodal resistance in its most economical torsion, a truth of truth, the tautology of which does not need to be discovered/invented: spirit as another word for the One and Versammlung [Derrida is presenting this politely as an hypothesis, but he knows it’s true]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida has problems w/ Heidegger’s interpretation of khōra in Introduction to Metaphysics

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: is the guarding, the call, of the question still the question? the question remains protected from that which is not a question, the un-thought, non-negative, un-gedacht

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: is Geist the name (beyond any other name) Heidegger gives to the unquestioned possibility of the question?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: “contamination by technology of the thinkable essence of technology”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, essence of technology is not technological; Derrida: what if it is? what is this desire for rigorous non-contamination? > envisage fatal necessity of a contamination

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger tries to save purity of a non-Christian Gestigkeit of Geist, a purity internal to spirit, though he recognizes evil (das Böse) is spiritual (geistlich)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s discourse [on hand], all the more peremptory and authoritarian for hiding its discomfiture, preserves, sheltered in obscurity, the profoundest metaphysical humanism

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: for Heidegger [Heidegger’s Hand], pragma, praxism, pragmata present themselves as vorhandene, zuhandene > all in domain of hand, that is, human (writing is handwriting)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, animals can’t question (no technē or spirit) > Heidegger always presenting his stance on animals as “theses,” which he avoids, for essential reasons, almost everywhere else

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: epochality is the hidden teleology of the narrative order

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: the more original the thought, the richer its unthought, the unthought is the highest gift a thought can give

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger does not make of spirit a limitation (Beschränkung) of Being; Heidegger’s use of spirit is most often axiological, axiomatic, axio-poetic > spirit doesn’t belong to onto-theology[?]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Descartes’ cogito not exemplary precedent of existential analytic because sum is not questioned [leap rather than genealogy]; Descartes commits the thingification of the subject, positing (Ansatz) of subjectum or hypokeimenon, a substance or substratum

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: spirit designates resource of any deconstruction, possibility of any evaluation

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, Descartes, Husserl, both dogmatic, their concepts not ontologically clarified via Being

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: spirit is what in no way allows itself to be thingified (substantialized, subjectum, hypokeimenon); w/out ontological clarification, thingification of spirit is dogmatic [Descartes, Husserl]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: the exemplarity of we, our we, is our Mitsein, discourse w/ ourselves and others, we who question/are questioned

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Dasein is exemplary because of the experience of the question; privileged entity for a reading of Being

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: spirit, soul, psyche, consciousness, ego, reason, subject block interrogation of Being of Dasein; the Jemeinigkeit of Dasein is not ego, not Vorhandene, not indifferent to but cares for its Being

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: how else but by confirming it a priori and circularly can Heidegger question Dasein’s privilege (Vorrang) re: the question?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Dasein’s indifference (Indifferenz, Gleichgültigkeit) is only possible because Dasein is not in-different, cares about Being, indifference as everydayness (not negative), its Durchschnittlichkeit

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: three forms of indifference: 1) stone, vorhandene entity 2) positive phenomenon of Dasein 3) paralyzing indifference, that of Descartes, substantializes a “who” as existing in form of Vorhandenheit > #2 and #3, however, are of the same capacity

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s Destruktion of “spirit,” vulgar concept of time, Dasein’s substance is not spirit but existence

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida proposes that analytic of Dasein could also be analytic of Gemüt (not Geist but still translated as esprit in one of the French translations)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: putting “spirit” in quotation marks preserves and withdraws something of Latin-Cartesian meaning [Heidegger hopes quotation marks free spirit from vulgar, uneigentlich]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, one must not say that the body alone has spatiality, this would be naive opinion (naïve Meinung) where spiritual being is transposed after the fact (nachträglich) into space

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: when Heidegger puts “spirit” in quotes it becomes a metaphysical ghost

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger rephrases Hegel’s “history of spirit unfolding in time” as “the development of history falls into time”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, Hegelian spirit ruled by epoch of Cartesian cogito, thus calls for deconstruction; Hegel called Descartes the Christopher Columbus of philosophical modernity

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: Hegel’s concept of time is “the most radical elaboration of the vulgar concept of time”; in vulgar concept of time, spirit falls into time determined as negation of negation, spirit presents itself as negation of negation too, its essence is the concept

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: for Heidegger, time forms transcendental horizon of existential analysis

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: “spirit” is originary temporalization

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: factitious existence “falls (fällt)” from originary temporality, from which it has its possibility

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s doubling of “spirit” by use of quotation marks affects it w/ obsessive specter, he doesn’t shelter “spirit,” a hospitality w/ reservations, quotations call for another word unless they re-call the other under the same

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: spirit’s affirmation, no quotations, spirit inflamed (and yes, I say this, because of the specters flame illuminates of terrifying moment) > Geist is flame, not pneuma or spiritus

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: beautiful description of the guard-like theatrical nature of quotation marks, and when they are relieved from “Geist” has spirit itself or spirit’s ghost (spectre) come on stage?

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: die Selbstbehauptung (self-affirmation) could not be what it is w/out spirit, and there is even a logic of spiritual guidance in Heidegger’s “terrifying” Rectorship Address [see pp. 34, 36-37]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: for Heidegger, Geist not pneuma, not spiritus, but flame, and he says this can only be thought in German

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: the imprint (Gepräge) marking destiny of Germans is onto-typological [Lacoue-Labarthe], is the imprint of spirit’s force

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Entschlossenheit (resolution) gives possible opening to Eigentlichkeit, authentic property of Dasein

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: spirit not Witz, not Reason of world, it is the being-resolved to the essence of Being, gives “rhythm to the march our people has begun toward its future history”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: [re: Heidegger’s Rectorship Address] le profond et l’altier (haughty) allied in most high: highest of what guides the spiritual guides of die hohe Schule and depths of forces of earth and blood

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: spirit writes hyphen btwn authorities and history, world, people, will to essence, to know

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s Rectorship Address—massive voluntarism?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: only choice is btwn the terrifying contaminations it assigns [re: subjectity of spirit]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: price of the strategy of “spirit,” always turns back on “subject,” even when used to displace subject from racism, biologism, naturalism, the opposition requires a “unilaterality of subjectity,” an oppositional determination > whether “human rights” or democracy, freedom of spirit demarcates a metaphysics of subjectity that is blind to the irreducibility of complicity, contamination (even if, and there are, degrees)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: perhaps Heidegger infused Nazism w/ spirit to absolve it? to save it?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s Rectorship Address is diabolical because it capitalizes on the worst, both evils at once: sanctions nazism and a metaphysical gesture [spirit w/out quotations]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Geist is always haunted by its Geist, a ghost is always the other’s ventriloquist; metaphysics always returns in the sense of a revenant, Geist is the most fatal figure of revenance: the double which can never be separated from the single > spirit is its double

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger wards off bad double of spirit, ghost of subjectity, by means of Destruktion

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, Missdeutung of philosophy, as figure of spirit: it is supposed to procure systems, world-pictures (Weltbild), map of world (Weltkarte), be the functionary of fundamental

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Vor-fragen of Führung, spirit, freedom of spirit, an Ursprung, leap, allows question to not solely reflect back on itself: why? why? why? > spirit = already questioning conduction

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: spiritual duction as possibility of question, Vor-fragen, freedom of spirit comes before, in front, anticipates

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: what seems in service of determinate politics [nazism] in Rectorship Address, w/ spirit awakening from Vor-fragen of Führung, could be a following of the will-to-know?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: geopolitics is a Weltpolitik of spirit, world is not earth, earth obscures the world, preeminence of mediocre, massification of man, destruction of earth

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, animality is not de l’esprit

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: the confusion of Heidegger’s “animal is weltarm (poor-in-world)” > since it is not a matter of degrees it avoids anthropocentrism, but reconstitutes anthropocentrism (measure of man) in the designation of lack or privation

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: animal has and does not have world, has access to entities, but not entities als sich

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Aristotle’s dynamis (potentiality) is a virtuality oriented by a telos

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: doesn’t the having-of-world for man include an unheimliche privation of world (like the animal)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: no world w/out spirit

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: for Heidegger, privation (Privation) in Dasein, in structure of “as,” structure of “something as something (die Struktur des Etwas als Etwas),” not same as animal’s privation (Entbehrung)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger suggests we draw a line through rock to think animal’s relation to it

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: erasure of the name, name of rock, erasure of possibility to name rock, as such, to access being-rock

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s absolute limit btwn man and animal distances itself from biologism, philosophy of life, politics, and Rilke—and Nietzsche too

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: though Derrida sees a “humanist teleology” in the hierarchization of man to animal (found in the negation imposed on animal w/ weltarm), one which requires not one ontology but the very possibility of the onto-logical, he isn’t criticizing it (it does denounce biologism, racism, and naturalism) > can we escape this program? can we transform it by “reconnoitering it right down to its most tortuous ruses and most subtle resources”?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, animal not in human world as Vorhandenheit nor Zuhandensein, and not Dasein, animal neither categorical nor existential, the 2 pairs of concepts structuring Sein und Zeit > does the animal threaten the whole order of the existential analytic?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: [Heidegger appeals to depth (Tiefe) positively, sees destitution (Entmachtung) of spirit/world as a flattening, where dimension has become extension & number]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s destitution of spirit is not a crisis of spirit: crisis, acc. Derrida, would perhaps be treated by Heidegger as a symptom of Cartesian heritage

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: that a spirit is force and is not force, has and does not have force, is a relation to double, a relation to haunting; Entmachtung (destitution) is inevitable (fatale), since ghost of spirit is never perceived

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: for Heidegger, that which causes destitution of spirit is of spirit, is its double, its spectral duplicity; yet, this is not Descartes’ Evil Genius (böse Geist), the destitution, the demonic, comes from cogito’s substantializaton, accepts lies, destruction, doesn’t question (Schellingian)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger read Bergson

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: for Heidegger, Marxism’s falsification of spirit occurs w/ transformation of spirit into superstructural, powerless intellect, and, symmetrically, organization of people as living mass

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: for Heidegger, there’s a resignation of spirit into intelligence (Intelligenz), understanding (Verständigkeit), calculation (Berechnung), mass distribution (massenhafte Verteilung); however, Heidegger, says Derrida, would not agree w/ Derrida’s structure of haunting—would be a resignation to calculating authority: Derrida does not agree w/ imaginary Heidegger

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: spirit is “eine ursprünglich einigende, verpflichtende geistige Macht (a spiritual power which originally unites and engages, assigns, obliges)”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: [when is spirit not used as propaganda?]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida stresses theater of Heidegger’s removal (w/out remarking) of quotation marks from “spirit”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: silent play of quotation marks [re: spirit], Anführungsstriche, Anführungszeichen, “the hand calculates very fast,” Anführen, to conduct, dupe, brainwash, silent contrivances, fort/da, what shows or hides changes everything, and when one puts away after exhibiting, this is mise au pas (bringing to heel)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida asks Heidegger: how can we move from resignation to responsibility? Heidegger responds by calling it back to care of Being, the question and language

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: can one speak of “logic” in region of originarity of language (le langage), of a given language (langue)?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida finds Heidegger “horribly dangerous (terriblement dangereux)” and “wildly funny (follement drôle)” in his irrefutable, strange paradoxy [his tautologies?]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: Greek language and reflection, along w/ German, most powerful and spiritual language

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: for Heidegger, signature of thought never individual, commits via community, people, in his or her own language; there are only some languages open to Being: German, Greek

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: in Der Spiegel interview, Heidegger: when they begin to think, the French speak German

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: that one can only think in German is a half-asleep tautology (confirmed by ideas of untranslatability of Sein, Denken, Geist)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: to name spirit is to offer for thinking, German only language in which spirit comes to name itself

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida imagines how Greeks would have responded to Heidegger’s claim about their pneuma via Geist > imagines they would claim prerogative of Greek

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger (via Schelling), Geist never Spiritus, but it is pneuma, but really it is flame; only German can name spirit, not even Greek

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger saves Nietzsche’s text (from accusation of biologism, zoologism, racism [?]) by damning it: still metaphysics of absolute subjectity like Hegel: Nietzsche’s absolute subjectity that of body, impulsions, affects; Hegel’s that of the willing that knows itself

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: is a metaphysics of race less serious than a naturalism or biologism of race? [re: Nietzsche’s “blonde beast”]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: discusses relation of Geist in Hölderlin to Hegel and Schelling, can’t be identical to metaphysical usage, even if borrowed from philosophers

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Geschick, Schickliche, Schicksal, Geschichte, untranslatable because this chain is deployed in its own idiomatic mission of history

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Schelling: spirit is breath of love, but love is the Most High [i.e. higher than spirit]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: [Irigaray’s no air to breathe] Derrida on spirit’s link to pneuma > might just make das Wehen (the breath, the sigh) breathless, the breathless-making “spiration” of spirit

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: spirit as a revenant, founds history as breath of something it cannot name, return to what is to-come in Hölderlin, the poet must preserve this experience in his Gemüt

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, thoughts of spirit inhabit soul of poet, they are home there, poet gives soul rather than life, insufflates the soul

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: following a limit in a way where division is almost impossible because it touches both sides of limit [re: limit btwn philosophemes and the sayings of Dichter]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: “in spirit there reigns the nostalgia for its own essence”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: via Heidegger’s course on Schelling, spirit is only proper if it is close to itself, desire for gathering, a nostalgia, a Sehnsucht, where Sucht, etymologically, isn’t research but evil, evil inscribed in desire > evil as the desire to go out of oneself in order to return to oneself (motif, movement, trajectory of fire, not circle, of return)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: in Der Ister, Hölderlin calls to the fire, Jetzt komme, Feuer!, fire as what comes, call for to-come > acc. Heidegger, Hölderlin, the Beseeler, has been struck by God of light, gift of spirit as incineration, cremation, almost becoming ash [MOP & annihilation of trace]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Hölderlin: Jetzt komme, Feuer!

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: what is later, the latest, can be close to the origin, or return to origin earlier than beginning

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s Gespräch w/ Trakl: language speaks in speech, speaks about itself, refers to itself by deferring itself

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: furnace of spirit (embrasement de l’esprit), spirit in-flames (l’esprit en-flamme) (verb and noun)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger on Trakl, not to understand but to listen to the sound, a distinction btwn the Erörterung (situation, thought of site, Ort) of the poet and the Erläutung (elucidating reading) of the philosopher [Heidegger never indulges in commentary]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: spirit divides and gathers in conflagration, inflames and inflames itself [absolute spontaneity]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: furnace (embrasement) of spirit (affects, affects itself, and gets affected by fire)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger would refuse designation “commentary” for ontological statement, Derrida asks if we do anything other than commentary [at moment he goes beyond commentary]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, first blow is simple duality if difference (Zweifache), second blow is agonistic dissension (Zweitracht) [see p. 106]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: the becoming-crepuscular (Dämmerung) is not a decline (Untergang), it shields the year, the course of the sun [Jahr, march (ier, ienai, gehen), translates race or course of sun]

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger interprets der Wahnsinnige in Trakl to mean that the stranger is on the way to elsewhere (as madness, de-ceased, toward the unborn, Artaud’s in-nate)—like a revenant, Derrida adds [p. 92 journey, Abgeschiedenheit of stranger]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida uses revenant to describe a Heideggerian passage on Trakl in spite of the metaphysical negativity Heidegger might reject in it: re-venir as the idea of an end before a beginning, originary essence of time kept under veil, guarded in its archi-origin > we are still prisoners of Aristotelian representation of time

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s distinguishes West of Trakl from that of Platonic-Christian West via thought of Versprechen [de Man’s Die Sprache verspricht sich]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: promise as the promise of the day before the day before

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: would Heidegger approve of Derrida’s attempt to make Versprechen other than a modality or modification of Sprache? ——promise (Versprechen) announces, salutes, what has already taken place “before” (this is the temporality of the coming of the event, Ereignis or Geschehen), it is the dissymmetry of a yes before opposition of yes and no, before question, language always revient à de la promesse

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: promise as the promise of the day before the day before; acc. Heidegger, there’s a “must” a “we must think” of the promise, thought as fidelity to promise > must hear & obey

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger on Trakl’s avoidance (vermeiden) of word “geistig”: is contrary opposed to material, names abyss (abîme, Kluft) btwn suprasensible (noeton) & sensible (aistheton) > Heidegger is condemning the degradation of “spiritual” into the “rational,” “intellectual,” “ideological”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: when Heidegger says spirit is fire he claims it is neither a metaphor nor a figure

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: duplicity of Geist, as its evil ghost, brings forth question: is ash good or evil? whiteness of ash which belongs to destiny consumed and consuming (conflagration of flame)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, spirit in-flames has evil in it already, thus an evil that is not Platonico-Christian, not of the body, evil is spiritual

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: spirit flames devour, consume, everything, including the white of ash

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: what is proper to spirit is its auto-affective [voice in VP] spontaneity; Geist from gheis, to be thrown (aufgebracht), to transport, transpose, deport (entsetzt)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Trakl: “flame is the brother of the palest”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: war of etymology [re: Geist], the ghosts flapping in what Artaud would call this “alchemical theater”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s avoidance of Geist as symptomatic foreclosure

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: from “holy spirit” (ruah haqqodech, ruah qodech) to “evil spirit” (ruah raa)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Jewish thought as inexhaustible thinking of fire

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: does Heidegger remain w/in a Schellingian metaphysics of evil? in spite of his attempt to go beyond Christianity

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: white of ash as des Zerstörerischen (the destruction) spirit deploys, as radical evil

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: animal cannot be evil because has no spirit, man can fall even lower than animal, can disjoin from die Seynsfuge (ontological fit)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: fire-writing, flame writes, writes itself, right in the flame (à même la flamme) > a Riss, frayage of this trait, a mark that leads spirit on the way to soul, pursues soul in way opened by its fire, trait de conflagration, l’esprit en-flamme—trace la route, il fraye la voie

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: from masculine spirit (that chases and hunts) to feminine soul (that guards and nourishes), the trait, re-trait (Riss from fire-writing), engraves sadness in spirit’s relation to itself, soul bears the sadness

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Heidegger, difference or duality inscribed by the trait (Riss) is not division, it is the gathering (Versammlung) of the place (Ort), the de-cease (dé-cès) (Abgeschiedenheit), in the one (Ein), the soul Gemüt, Ein Geschlecht, none other than Geist [path-breaking (frayage) of trait]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: double mark: it is the spirit in which it inscribes itself, traces itself, belongs to the flame it divides

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: origin as hétérogène à l’origine: 1) originarily heterogenous 2) heterogenous to what is called the origin, other than the origin 3) heterogenous and or insofar as at the origin: because and although (bien que) at the same time—is logical form of tension that makes this thought vibrate; p. 109 is this just the spirit of Christianity?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: most matutinal in Frühe, of promise, an other birth, other essence, hétérogène à l’origine, foreign to Christianity w/out being opposed to it, even more radically foreign to Platonic metaphysics

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: after discussing Heidegger's most matutinal morning, Derrida says, “I will not keep you here until morning”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: [re: Gespräch btwn Heidegger & Trakl] the circle via death, via decline, via West that returns to most originary not analogous to circles/revolutions in Marx and Hegel, so “circle, decline, West,” in Heidegger, are paleonyms, receive quotation marks to lead us elsewhere

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Nazism was not born in a desert but in a black European forest, world of spirit, culture (religions, philosophies, economic structures, religious/academic institutions)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida performs an imaginary question and response btwn Christian theologians and Heidegger

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s resurrection to come of Menschenschlag [a third blow?], blow which saves (rettet), hymn to archi-originary, yet-to-come event, what poet sings

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: performing as Heidegger, Derrida affirms [?] Heidegger’s rigorous repetition [not hollow], which crosses path of tout autre [re: attempt to move beyond Christianity]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: wouldn’t Jews, Moslem, Christians respond to Heidegger’s retrait, flame and fire-writing in promise? [messianic echoes]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: deinon as furchtbar and unheimlich

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: [citation of themes of animality in Glas and Postcard]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger: “Denn das Fragen ist die Frömmigkeit des Denkens (for questioning is the piety of thought)”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s mediocre and hideous crossing-out (rature) of Husserl (erasing dedication of Sein und Zeit)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Husserl shows signs of the worst w/ his racism against Eskimos, Papuans, Indians [spirit not an accidental ornament for Husserl’s thought]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: acc. Valéry, spirit is negative dialectics, “always says no,” and to itself, spirit opposed to life/nature [Nietzsche-like]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Valéry: says farewell to ghosts, world doesn’t need you [this exorcism equates spirit w/ death] [if you exorcise a ghost, you exorcise the spirit which produces the ghost]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: question of spirit: where is the worse?

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Valéry: ashes, ghosts

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Valéry: knowledge devours everything, turns all to ash

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: to be sensitive to humor despite seriousness [in Heidegger’s presumptions German, Greek re: Geist] could become an obligation (ethical, political), a chance, chance de l’esprit

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida reminds of Matthew Arnold, his Babelian phrase Get Geist, his claim that Geist is untranslatable > in Get Geist spirit apostrophizes itself, a beginning—no beginning (pas de commencement): in the beginning there will have been (ghost of future perfect)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Meister Eckhart: Augustine says Gemüt is like a receptacle (sloz) of spiritual images

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: from saying (sagen) to poetic saying (Dichten) to Einklang (accord of consonance) to hymn (Gesang, also gathering) to praise, prior to question

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: before the question, the question mark, language is already there, we have already said yes to it, given a pledge, acquiesced (Zusage,which also means promise, is for Heidegger a commitment of language toward language)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: before the word is the wordless word “yes,” a pre-originary pledge that precedes any engagement in language and action > no erasure is possible for such a pledge (memory before any souvenir), where faith defeats any narrative, la gage engage dans la langue

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger’s Kehre? from question to Zusage?: remove remnant of Aufklärung which still slumbered in privilege of the question? [Derrida is not having it]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Derrida avoids emphasizing a Kehre from Fragen to Zusage (the gage) in Heidegger by talking about a stratigraphy, a number of stratas that become visible, scarcely visible in Heidegger’s thought, so that resolution (Entschlossenheit), appeal (Rufsinn), original trustworthiness (Verlässlichkeit) are already there before “the turn”

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: parole is engaged in langue, it has already done so, an address always going back to an older event: Die Sprache west als dieser Zuspruch (“Language is active as this promise)

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: had Heidegger adhered to all his crossing-outs, this would have been silent voracity of an animal-machine, not simply “without spirit,” but a figure of evil [see ATIA p. 39 this animal-machine resembles the virus that obsesses “everything I write”]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: re: “Das Wesen der Sprache: Die Sprache des Wesens”—colon erases copula, allows question to be exceeded by pledge (consent to the address, en-gage), “is” would relaunch the question

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: [references to Hegel’s fire and spirit in Glas]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: St. Paul distinguishes “psychic man (psychikos anthropos)” from “spiritual man” (pneumatikos), only the latter accepts spirit of God

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Heidegger, in reference to Schelling, talks about the difficulty of returning to Greek thought (w/ a single leap) and abolishing Christianity [in philosophical thought, by decree]

source.title: Of Spirit: Heidegger and the Question

content: Luther: fire, tongues, sacred breath
